venues.name: Indian Springs Calistoga
venues.review: The oldest operating spa in California and still the best reason to drive to Calistoga. Volcanic ash mud baths heated by geothermal springs, mineral pools, and a main pool that's been in continuous use since 1860. Nothing in wine country feels more earned than this.

venues.name: Solage Calistoga
venues.review: Solage modernized the Calistoga mud bath without losing the point. The signature Mudslide ritual — volcanic mud, mineral soak, blanket wrap — is a proper multi-step treatment. The geothermal pools are excellent. Worth the step up from Indian Springs in budget.
